project_abstract.cdata: The objectives of the Second Social Fund Project are to help: 1) create jobs through support of small enterprises and labor intensive works; and 2) support community infrastructure and services in partnership with nongovernmental organizations (NGOs) and local groups. The project will include the following programs: 1) small-scale labor intensive works program; 2) community development program; 3) enterprise development program; 4) human resource development program; and 5) institutional development program.
